Hello, I'm Jing Wang, a Ph.D. student in the Department of Statistics at Univerisity of Connecticut. My research focuses on subsampling algorithms, rare-events data analysis, and transfer learning. I am currently working as a teaching assistant and a research assistant in the Department of Statistics at Uconn.
